summary: Moloch is a figure from the Bible, often linked to the ancient Canaanite god associated with child sacrifice. The name might also refer to the act of sacrifice itself. In art, Moloch is often shown as a bull-headed idol with hands over a fire, inspired by ancient stories and myths. This image has been used in many books and movies to represent something powerful that demands a great sacrifice. The true nature of Moloch and the sacrifices is still debated by scholars.
title: Moloch
